item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司首秀表现出色，股价上涨
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团的股票在周三的盘前交易中上涨了 11%，这是该公司首次亮相后的第二天。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group rose 11% in premarket trading on Wednesday, a day after their stellar debut.】

item.title: 欧盟最高法院驳回亚马逊暂停执行欧盟技术规则广告条款的请求
item.description: 欧盟最高法院周三表示，已驳回亚马逊提出的暂停履行公开广告库义务的请求。【原文：The European Union's top court on Wednesday said it had rejected a request by Amazon to suspend its obligation to make an advertisement repository publicly available.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪目标年销售额跃升 20
item.description: 据第一财经（CBN）周三报道，中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪（BYD）将2024年的销售目标定为360万辆，比去年破纪录的销量增长20%。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD set a 3.6 million sales target for 2024, up 20% from its record-breaking sales last year, China Business Network (CBN) reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司的肺癌疗法在晚期试验中获得成功
item.description: Novocure 公司周三表示，其癌症疗法达到了一项晚期试验的主要目标，该试验将其作为一种肺癌的治疗方法。【原文：Novocure said on Wednesday that its cancer therapy met the main goal of a late-stage trial testing it as a treatment for a type of lung cancer.】

item.title: 受红海危机影响，快时尚零售商 H&M 推迟了部分宣传活动
item.description: 全球第二大上市时装零售商 H&M 公司首席执行官丹尼尔-埃尔弗（Daniel Erver）周三表示，公司推迟了部分春夏季活动的开始时间，以适应红海危机造成的运输延误。【原文：H&M , the world's second-biggest listed fashion retailer, postponed the start of some Spring/Summer campaigns to adjust to shipping delays caused by the Red Sea crisis, CEO Daniel Erver said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 债券持有人团体 "坚决反对 "中国开发商世茂提出的债务重组方案
item.description: 违约的中国开发商世茂集团的一批主要债券持有人周三表示，"坚决反对 "该公司重整115亿美元海外债务的提议，这给该公司在房地产行业危机加深之际的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：A group of major bondholders of defaulted Chinese developer Shimao Group said on Wednesday it "firmly opposes" the firm's proposal to revamp $11.5 billion of offshore debt, clouding its prospects amid a deepening crisis in the property sector.】

item.title: Moderna 从 Blackstone Life Sciences 获得 7.5 亿美元，用于开发流感疫苗
item.description: Moderna 周三表示，该公司已与私募股权公司 Blackstone 的生命科学投资平台达成协议，将出资 7.5 亿美元开发 mRNA 流感疫苗。【原文：Moderna said on Wednesday it has entered into an agreement with private equity firm Blackstone's life science investment platform for a funding of $750 million to develop its mRNA flu vaccines.】

item.title: 日产首席执行官表示，即使取消首次公开募股，日产仍将投资雷诺电动汽车部门
item.description: 日产汽车首席执行官周三表示，尽管法国汽车制造商雷诺决定不将其电动汽车部门上市，但日本日产汽车仍将投资该联盟合作伙伴的电动汽车部门。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor will invest in the electric vehicle unit of alliance partner Renault even though the French carmaker has decided not to list the unit, Nissan's CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: ProSieben 拒绝 MFE 分离德国广播公司的要求
item.description: 德国广播公司 ProSiebensat.1 周三回击了 MFE-MediaForEurope 拆分公司的计划，并呼吁股东在下个月的年度股东大会上投票否决主要投资者的提议。【原文：German broadcaster ProSiebensat.1 on Wednesday pushed back against a plan by MFE-MediaForEurope to split up the company and called on shareholders to vote down its top investors' proposals at the annual general meeting next month.】

item.title: 瑞银向阿波罗出售 80 亿美元瑞士信贷资产
item.description: 瑞银集团已将瑞士信贷的证券化产品业务出售给阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management），这是该集团收购倒闭银行集团后出售非核心资产努力的一部分。【原文：UBS has sealed the sale of Credit Suisse's securitised products business to Apollo Global Management as part of efforts to shed non-core assets after its takeover of the collapsed banking group.】

item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司股票让一些投资者获得了转瞬即逝的暴利
item.description: 本周二，即特朗普的 "DJT "股票交易的第一天，由于对前总统唐纳德-特朗普的 "Truth Social "的新股票代码可能存在混淆，一些投资者的经纪余额短暂跳涨了数十万美元。【原文：Possible confusion over the new stock symbol for former President Donald Trump's Truth Social saw some investor brokerage balances briefly jump by hundreds of thousands of dollars on Tuesday, the first day Trump's "DJT" ticker traded.】

item.title: 快餐公司看到低收入食客减少点餐
item.description: 美国快餐店和餐馆的价格飞涨已经让收入水平较低的人望而却步，包括麦当劳和温迪在内的连锁店高管最近表示，他们担心会失去那些预算最紧张的人的生意。【原文：Runaway prices at U.S. fast-food joints and restaurants have made people skittish down the income ladder and executives at chains including McDonald's and Wendy’s recently said they worry about losing business from those on the tightest budgets.】

item.title: 专家称巴尔的摩大桥港口封锁不会引发新的供应链危机
item.description: 经济学家和物流专家表示，巴尔的摩港灾难性的桥梁坍塌导致船舶运输关闭，但这不太可能引发新一轮重大的美国供应链危机，也不会导致商品价格飙升，因为在东海岸的竞争港口有充足且不断增长的备用容量。【原文：The catastrophic bridge collapse that closed the Port of Baltimore to ship traffic is unlikely to trigger a major new U.S. supply chain crisis or spike goods prices, due to ample and growing spare capacity at competing East Coast ports, economists and logistics experts say.】

item.title: 美国太阳能工厂达成生产 "美国制造 "电池板协议
item.description: 两家小型太阳能制造商周三表示，他们将联手生产太阳能电池板，使他们的客户--美国太阳能项目开发商--能够获得联邦为美国制造的清洁能源设备提供的利润丰厚的新补贴。【原文：Two small solar manufacturers on Wednesday said they are joining forces to make panels that will enable their customers, U.S. solar project developers, to collect on a lucrative new federal subsidy for American-made clean energy equipment.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元再次走强，日本发出警告
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称斯巴鲁将在美国召回超过 118,000 辆汽车
item.description: 美国斯巴鲁汽车公司 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周三表示，斯巴鲁将在美国召回 118,723 辆 SUV 和轿车，原因是这些车辆在发生碰撞时安全气囊无法展开。【原文：Subaru of America is recalling 118,723 SUVs and sedans in the U.S. over an issue which prevents air bags from deploying in a crash, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 期货回升；焦点转向美联储官员的言论
item.description: 美国股指期货在上一交易日收低后于周三反弹，投资者将注意力转移到美联储官员的言论上，以衡量央行在假期稀少的一周中的政策走向。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rebounded on Wednesday after ending lower in the last session, as investors shifted focus to comments from Federal Reserve officials to gauge the central bank's policy path in a holiday-thinned week.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商尼奥下调第一季度交付量预期
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商尼奥周三下调了第一季度交付量预期，因为该公司正努力应对需求放缓和中国的价格战。【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle maker Nio lowered its forecast for first-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as it grapples with slowing demand and a price war in China.】

item.title: 智利开放锂盐滩供投资，保留两处由国家控制
item.description: 智利政府周二向私人投资开放了二十多个锂盐滩，同时保留了多产的阿塔卡马（Atacama）和马里昆加（Maricunga）矿床，由国家控股锂开采。【原文：Chile's government on Tuesday opened up more than two dozen lithium salt flats to private investment, while reserving the prolific Atacama and Maricunga deposits for state majority control in lithium extraction.】

item.title: 德意志银行股价创 6 年新高，因 MS 调升评级
item.description: 在摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）股票评级上调至 "增持 "后，德意志银行股价周三攀升至六年多来的最高点，跑赢了疲软的银行业。【原文：Shares in Deutsche Bank climbed to their highest in more than six years on Wednesday, outperforming a weaker banking sector following a Morgan Stanley upgrade to "overweight".】

item.title: 人民币下滑，市场押注将出现更多贬值
item.description: 中国的人民币正在下滑，市场参与者怀疑当局正在有意地、缓慢地让人民币轻微贬值，以配合宽松的货币政策和支持出口。【原文：China's yuan is sliding and market participants suspect authorities are deliberately but slowly engineering a light depreciation of the currency, both to complement an easy monetary policy and to support exports.】

item.title: 雷诺将出售约 2.5%的日产汽车股份，售价高达 3.62 亿欧元
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺在一份声明中表示，计划将日产汽车约 2.5% 的股份出售给这家日本护理制造商，这笔交易可能带来高达 3.62 亿欧元（约合 3.9176 亿美元）的现金流入。【原文：French car maker Renault said in a statement it plans to sell about 2.5% of Nissan's shares to the Japanese care maker in a deal that could result in a cash inflow of up to 362 million euros ($391.76 million).】

item.title: 国际纸业提出收购建议后，DS Smith 股价大涨 7
item.description: DS Smith 的股票周三开盘上涨 7.7%，此前该公司称正在与国际纸业公司就其在美国上市的竞争对手提出的全股票收购要约进行谈判。【原文：Shares in DS Smith opened 7.7% higher on Wednesday after the company said it is in talks with International Paper over an all-stock offer from its U.S.-listed rival.】

item.title: 消息人士称，作为全球改革的一部分，花旗在亚太地区裁员 10 人
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，花旗集团亚太区股票研究部门本周已裁员至少 10 人，该行正在推进全球全面改革的最后阶段。【原文：Citigroup Inc has laid off at least 10 people in its equities research department in Asia Pacific this week, two sources with knowledge of the matter said, as the bank pushes through the last phase of a sweeping global overhaul.】

item.title: H&M 提议由海伦娜-萨克森接替尼克拉斯-赞斯特罗姆进入董事会
item.description: 瑞典时装零售商 H&M 公司周三表示，其提名委员会提议海伦娜-萨克森（Helena Saxon）担任新的董事会成员。【原文：Swedish fashion retailer H&M said on Wednesday its nomination committee proposes Helena Saxon as a new board member.】

item.title: 时装零售商 H&M 第一季度营业利润增幅超出预期
item.description: 全球第二大上市时装零售商 H&M 周三公布，12 月至 2 月期间的营业利润高于预期。【原文：H&M , the world's second-biggest listed fashion retailer, reported on Wednesday a larger-than-expected operating profit for the December-February period.】

item.title: 投资者称，大石油公司的气候规划不够完善
item.description: 全球领先的投资者气候行动组织周三表示，欧洲和北美最大的 10 家上市石油和天然气公司目前的低碳转型计划不足以评估所涉及的风险。【原文：The current low-carbon transition plans of 10 of Europe's and North America's biggest listed oil and gas companies are not good enough to assess the risks involved, the world's leading investor climate action group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行与 Nexi 就重新谈判支付协议达成广泛一致，报纸称
item.description: 据《Il Sole 24 Ore》周三报道，意大利联合信贷银行和支付公司 Nexi 已就重新谈判现有协议的大原则达成一致。【原文：Italian bank UniCredit and payments company Nexi have agreed on the broad principles to renegotiate their existing agreement, the Il Sole 24 Ore newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 种族关系紧张让德国公司失去了熟练的外国劳动力
item.description: 经理约尔格-恩格尔曼（Joerg Engelmann）说，为了吸引熟练的外国工人到他位于德国东部开姆尼茨的化学工程公司工作，他已经使出了浑身解数。但是，他们一到这里，就被镇上的种族谩骂和排斥所驱赶。【原文：Manager Joerg Engelmann says he has pulled out all the stops to attract skilled foreign workers to his chemical engineering company in Chemnitz, east Germany. But once they arrived, the racial slurs and exclusion they experienced in the town have driven some of them away.】

item.title: 独家报道：软件业呼吁英国政府提供更多支持
item.description: 人们敦促英国政府采取包括税收优惠和人才签证在内的措施，为软件产业提供更多支持。【原文：Britain's government has been urged to provide more support for the software industry with measures including tax incentives and talent visas.】
